component.name: SIPE
component.summary: Pidgin protocol plugin to connect to MS Office Communicator

description.p: SIPE is a third-party plugin for the Pidgin/Adium/Miranda/Telepathy multi-protocol instant messaging clients/frameworks. It implements the extended version of SIP/SIMPLE used by various products:
With this plugin you should be able to replace your Microsoft Office Communicator client with Pidgin/Adium/Miranda/Telepathy.
